Feed Participant Names

Instructions:

Submit 3 .txt files named standby.txt | participants.txt | admins.txt
The files should each contain a list of names with each name on it's own row.
No extra spaces or rows.

participants.txt Must be divisible by 10. It should have the names of all of the players who are playing (including admins) but not standbys.
admins.txt should have just the admins.
Standby.txt should have just standby players.
